"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ffb95d63687279036a0c00#post_54ffb95d63687279036a0c00
African Greys
I heard from a documentary there was one that could do simple math, tell colours and shapes and things like that. And they can have the largest vocabularies too 

My bird is pretty smart himself. He learns tricks very easily and he knows how to get into trouble. He has a toy that is meant to make him work for his treats by being a bit like a puzzle and he never even had to learn how to do it, he got it right away.
